summary: Deloitte is the world's largest professional services company, offering accounting, consulting, and financial advice. Founded in London in 1845, it has grown into a global network with over 457,000 employees in more than 150 countries. Deloitte is one of the "Big Four" accounting firms and has been involved in several high-profile projects, like the 2012 Summer Olympics. However, the company has also faced controversies, such as a cyberattack in 2017 and criticism over some of its reports and audits.
title: Deloitte
